lines.text:
[Nanu is smitten on meeting Jane]
Me Nanu. You Jane.
Now that doesn't sound quite right...

[tutoring Nanu in biology, Jane has him hold her hand]
Your brain signaled the muscles in your hand to contract in order to hold my hand. Is that clear?
You can stop holding my hand.
I've never seen anything like this in my entire illustrious career!
My country is currently investing to attract more Doctors.
The Innocent Man will live, the Guilty one will die.
[Both the accused drink the potion in turn. The one on the left retches and dies. Then the other one retches and dies too]
I guess they were both guilty...
